content.html:
Inaction Is A Slow Death, by Better Ideas on YouTube.

Wow.

Iâ€™m approaching 50, and this really hit home. How much living have I missed while dwelling in my own pain, waiting for things to change.

Time to take it on the chin.

content.html: #homescreen
content.value:
iPhone homescreen setup with a dark grey background, and large Drafts widget at the top blended with the background. Apps include Notes, Raindrop, Glass, Halide, Reeder, Micro.blog, Epilogue, and Mimi Uploader. Dock includes Mail, Safari, Messages, and Settings. 
#homescreen

content.html: Beautiful timepiece arrived, no Apple Watch for me. Solar powered for the win.

content.html:
This morning I saw a video of a baseball fan using a straw to carve out the centre of his hotdog, so he could use it as a straw for his beer.

There really is no saving ourselves, is there?
